articles.title: Software shares are in the doldrums. Blame AI
articles.summary: Tech companies are giving the world artificial intelligence — but ironically, the tech sector itself is among those now feeling the most pain from AI.

articles.title: Nvidia Earnings Are the Stock Market Risk Event After Fed Rally
articles.summary: Traders are breathing easier heading into this week after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell indicated that interest rate cuts are coming. The next test for the stock market will be a read on what’s been driving gains for the past few years: artificial intelligence euphoria.
